title: Desiccation
description: Robert Kavanaugh hasn't always made the best decisions in his life. Consequently, he's living in a small apartment avoiding the stack of divorce papers awaiting his signature. When rushing out to work one morning, he walks into an old woman whose appearance repulses him. He has the opportunity to apologize but decides, instead, to unleash his anger and frustrations in a string of cruel, nasty words. Only this woman has some words of her own to impart--and Robert will come to truly regret his poor choices.
author: Angel Gelique
